function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of respiratory infections through contact with surfaces and indoor environments","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 and other communicable infections","Mitigation":"Implementing strict cleaning protocols, promoting hand hygiene, and using antimicrobial materials","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV-C disinfection systems, antimicrobial coatings","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, engineers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Accumulation of human-related microbes and pathogens in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission and illness among building occupants","Mitigation":"Regular ventilation, air circulation, and UV-C disinfection","Technologies":"HVAC systems with UV-C lights, mechanical ventilation systems, air quality monitors","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, facility managers","Owner":"Architects, engineers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Contamination of fomites and surfaces with SARS-CoV-2 particles","Impact":"Risk of indirect transmission of COVID-19 through contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Frequent cleaning and disinfection, use of antimicrobial materials, and promoting hand hygiene","Technologies":"Antimicrobial sprays, UV-C disinfection, electrostatic disinfection systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, cleaning staff, healthcare workers"}]}
